2164.subject: CST
2164.descrlong:
Helps students identify and articulate personal, professional, and social goals. Provides an integrated overview of the computer science and communication design majors and their requirements. Students develop a plan for their learning goals. Students learn writing, presentation, research and critical-thinking skills within the diversified fields of information technology and communication design. Students learn how to analyze, predict, and articulate trends in the academic, public service, (Offered every semester.) 

[Prereq: (GE Areas A1 and A2 and A3) and (Junior or Senior Standing)]
